alert.note: Alert for Chowan; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 6:18PM EDT until May 04 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PERQUIMANS AND SOUTHERN CHOWAN COUNTIES... At 617 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cape Colony, or 13 miles southwest of Hertford, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Cape Colony around 630 PM EDT. Snug Harbor around 700 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Light Nixon Fork, Drummond Point, Saint Johns, Macedonia, Hancock, Yeopim Station and Somerset. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Wakefield.
